summary: "Prison Break" is an American TV show about two brothers, Lincoln and Michael. Lincoln is going to die for a crime he didn't do, so Michael plans a big escape to save him. The show is very popular and has won awards. It started in 2005 and has five seasons. There are also games, a spin-off, and a sixth season is being planned. The story continues with the brothers trying to prove Lincoln's innocence and survive many dangers.
title: Prison Break
